title: Apple Stock Is on Track to Hit an All-Time High — Valuation Soars Past $1 Trillion
text:
Apple shares have climbed the proverbial wall of worry to an all-time high, sending the company’s valuation soaring past the $1 trillion level.

All year, naysayers on Apple shares (ticker: AAPL) have been predicting trouble. There were worries that they would be badly battered in China by trade tensions. There were worries that demand for the latest generation of iPhones would find lackluster consumer interest. There were worries that the company’s new video and mobile-gaming services would get no traction with consumers....
description: Apple shares were up more than 2% Friday afternoon at $234 and change, ahead of the previous record close at 232.07 set in October 2018.
